item.title: Cant change title button or box? {317}
item.dc:creator: @im4ever12c im4ever12c
item.description:
@im4ever12c wrote:

Hey guys, for some reason, i can’t seem to change the Titlebox or TitleButton background of the client i am using.

I changed the background just fine, but i can’t find the right img file in the cache to edit the titlebutton or titlebox.

private void loadTitleScreen() { if(normalLogin == true) titleBox = new Background(titleStreamLoader, "titlebox", 0); else titleBox1 = new Sprite("Login/Random/titlebox"); titleButton = new Background(titleStreamLoader, "titlebutton", 0);

This is the code to load them in the client, but yet, those files are not even located in the cache files. Any help?
